description.en-US: A fun camera app to apply effects on the fly Please note Firefox OS still doesn't allow access to the live camera feed You can still process existing pictures that you might have already taken with the Camera app. // GALLERY VIEW // The first thing you see when you open the app is the gallery view. Tap the camera or file picker buttons to start adding images to the gallery. When you have images in the gallery, you can tap over them to see each image, and download/export it to your device. You can also press the share button to upload it to imgur, or delete the picture. // LIVE CAMERA VIEW // If using the camera you'll be asked for access to the camera. Depending on your configuration, you might even be able to select which camera to use (front or back in mobiles, or an specific webcam in desktop platforms). Once you allow access to the camera, a live feed with special effects applied on the fly will show up and you'll be able to capture the frames you like most by tapping and holding down the screen or the camera shutter button. You can change between effects by swiping right or left, or pressing the left/right arrow buttons. ... and it has VIDEO!! You can tap the switch on the bottom to toggle between camera and video modes. When in video mode you can capture up to two seconds of animated GIF frames. To start capturing, hold down as if you were going to take a picture, and the app will start capturing frames until either you reach two seconds of length, or stop holding down. You can add more frames by holding down again, up to the two seconds limit, or press the 'OK' tick sign. When you reach the limit or press the tick sign, the app will start processing the captured frames to build the animated GIF. Meanwhile you won't be able to capture frames or take pictures. When the rendering is completed, the GIF will be added to your gallery. // PROCESSING EXISTING IMAGES // If picking an existing image, you will be shown standard interfaces for picking a picture from your device. Once you select one you can start changing between effects just as before, by swiping left or right, or pressing the arrow buttons. When you like an image, hold down to add it to the gallery. // SOURCE CODE / CONTRIBUTE // rtcamera is an open source app. You can look at the code, see how it's made, learn from it and even help to make it better! View the source code, and make sure to read the developer walkthrough if you want to contribute to the project development.
